definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo obtain the best extraction process of Xiaocuoyin.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选消痤饮的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: His fury moderated when he learned why she had done it.
sentences.chinese: 当他知道了她那样做的原因时，他的火气就消了。

sentences.english: Frontogenesis and frontolysis have decisive effect on the precipitation near Meiyu front.
sentences.chinese: 锋生锋消对于梅雨锋附近有无降水起到了重要的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the bacteriostasis of XCJF cream in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解消痤洁肤乳膏在体外的抗菌效果。

sentences.english: We use a new deblurring function that is easier to implement than inverse filter.
sentences.chinese: 采用了新的消模糊函数，它比起逆滤波器较易于制作。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of "Xiaojia Decoction" in preventing the recurrence and metastasis of postoperative mammary carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察消瘕方预防乳腺癌术后的复发及转移。

sentences.english: The more low noise control, is the sound-absorbing effect with the censored box.
sentences.chinese: 更低的噪音控制，就是加装具有吸音效果的消音箱。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the anti-inflammatory and analgesic action of Yantongxiao unguent.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察炎痛消软膏的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.english: After a while he began to feel sleepy and decided that he would lie down and disgest his meal in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿他有些犯困，便决定还是先躺下来消消食。

sentences.english: The data of the paper can be used to explain …
sentences.chinese: 本文的结果可用来说明半导体消雷器的机制。

sentences.english: The depression generally lifts during spring and summer.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁通常在春季和夏季消褪。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect mechanism of resolving acne capsule on treating acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药消痤胶囊治疗寻常痤疮的作用机理。
这个手机需要消消毒了。

sentences.english: Scald the needles to sterilize them.
sentences.chinese: 用沸水烫洗一下这些针，消一下毒。

sentences.english: The fog vanished away when the sun came out.

definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
sacrifice to drive away calamity/to dispel/to drive away/to remove
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
